授業目的: This course introduces students to the analytical study of aspects of contemporary Japanese culture and society.
到達目標: After taking this course, students will have acquired basic skills relevant to the analytical study of contemporary Japanese culture and society.

Understanding and analytical skills regarding international issues: the ability to understand and analyze various regions of the world from different perspectives in the humanities and social sciences.2. Problem-solving skills: the ability to proactively identify problems and solve them based on appropriate methods.3.
